title: List of videos
html_content:
Chris's recent failings have helped CWCki gather more information for this article.
Be a winner by adding this information in.


Below is a list of all the non-fanmade videos Chris has appeared in.

1994—2008

1994

  • Sonic the Hedgehog Watch & Win Sweepstakes 26 February 1994 (2:05) Reason Television Video games Rainbow Leaked
    The local news do a piece on Chris, who just won a contest held in 1993 to promote the cartoon Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog.

1998

  • Song of Christian 15 May 1998 (20:57) Tragedy Rage Reason Crazy Rumors Video games Leaked
    A 16-year-old Chris reads a poem he wrote for class, and rages over it getting an F.
  • Mario Kart 64 Lego Raceway 4 June 1998 (13:18) Video games Machinima Leaked
    Chris films a series of stop-motion videos centered around his Lego sets, using his Game Boy Camera.

1999

  • Chris Chan in the PokéNews 16 October 1999 (2:02) Smug Television PokéShirt Leaked
    The local news do a fluff piece on the rise of the Pokémon fandom, and a 17-year-old Chris happens to be among the children playing the game.

2001

  • The City of Cwicville Tour! 12 July 2001 (0:50) Leaked Machinima
    Chris films a tour of CWCville on his Game Boy Camera.

2003

  • Animal Crossing Documentary 22 November 2003 (55:54) Comedy Reason Video games Website Machinima Leaked
    Chris wastes a whole hour giving tours of his 2 towns in Animal Crossing.

2004

  • The 24th Wedding Anniversary Special 7 June 2004 (24:28) Comedy Reason Video games Machinima Leaked
    Chris makes an anniversary tribute to his parents in Animal Crossing, providing valuable background on his parents and how they met in a bar.
  • All I Want For Christmas Is a Pretty Girlfriend 20 December 2004 (7:02) Tragedy Crazy Music Sex Rage Galpals Other
    Chris sings the first track by Christian and the Hedgehog Boys, and his rewrite of "All I Want for Christmas is My Two Front Teeth" by Spike Jones.
  • ChandlerFamilyChristmas2004 25 December 2004 (11:40) Other Tragedy Leaked
    Chris walks around his house on Christmas, and he and his parents open presents.
  • ChrisAfterChristmas2004 25 December 2004 (1:16) Other Galpals Tragedy Leaked
    Chris talks about how his Christmas went, and pines for his gal-pal Sarah Hammer.

2005

  • Harvey Birdman commercial 24 February 2005 (:30) Comedy Crazy Television Classic Shirt Leaked
    Chris makes a commercial for the first Harvey Birdman, Attorney at Law DVD set, taking the opportunity to ramble on about Mary Lee Walsh in the process.

2006

  • Pixelated PS3 28 November 2006 (0:54) Comedy Crazy Video games Television Classic Shirt Leaked
    Chris showcases his PS2 covered in Pixelblocks.

2007

  • C.W.C.'s SlideShow of Photographs, Art, and Comics 24 February 2007 (1:34:12) Music Leaked
    Chris films an extremely boring slideshow.
  • Christian Weston Chandler's FUTURE MESSAGE 24 February 2007 (9:02) Comedy Reason Crazy Galpals Homos Sex Television Other Classic Shirt
    In celebration of his milestone 25th birthday, Chris proactively delivers his manifesto, and also summarizes how the lessons he has learned in his life should be applied.
  • Soul Calibur: Chris vs Mary Lee Walsh 1 May 2007 (1:24) Rage Crazy Violence Video games Machinima
    Chris takes revenge against Mary Lee Walsh by beating up her effigy in a fighting game on the easiest setting.
  • Chop Chop Master Onion's Rap Showdown 29 June 2007 (3:18) Comedy Music Video games Megan Stackhouse Orange
    Chris does a rap for the titular competition.
  • CWC is Angry August 2007 (2:15) Rage Crazy Violence Music Video games Stackhouse Classic Shirt
    Chris shoots a photo of contest winner Adam Stackhouse.
  • Chris Chan's Public Announcement (8:11) Reason Rumors ED Yellow & Red Stripe
    Chris assumes the contributors at ED have simply misunderstood him and his work, and attempts to re-introduce himself so that things can start over on the right foot.

August 2008

  • CWC's Second Message 3 August 2008 (9:52) Rage Reason Tragedy Rumors Homos Comics Galpals ED Red & White
    Chris delivers a huge message to all his haters.
  • Attention All Sonichu Fans (NOT HATERS) (2:13) Rage Comics ED PokéShirt
    Chris addresses only those Sonichu fans who do not hate him, telling them to send hate e-mail to Jason Kendrick Howell until the ED page is deleted, so that he can work on his comics in peace.
  • Kudos to the Encyclopedia DramaDestruction (4:42) Comedy Reason Smug Comics ED South African Flag
    Chris realizes that ED is down, and commands his followers to withhold donations for a new server.
  • An Official Sonichu Update (6:27) Reason Smug Comics Video games ED Sea Green
    Chris concedes that, despite his best efforts, ED has successfully raised the funds needed to remain in operation, although he does not really admit failure in his campaign.
  • Sonichu Game Talk (12:06) Reason Comics Video games Sea Green
    Chris makes an extra long video to discuss JK Productions's Sonichu, which he would later discover was an elaborate prank.

September 2008

  • Christian's Update 11 September 2008 (2:37) Tragedy Galpals Blanca Hill Blue & Red Sleeved Rugby
    Chris realizes Blanca is a troll and asks his fans not to buy the Sonichu merchandise created by Jimmy Hill.
  • Christian's Update 13 September 2008 (2:54) Video games Galpals Comics Rumors Blanca Hill Jerkop
    Chris now insists that Blanca is real and not responsible for tricking him after all.
  • Chris Chan Update 24 September 2008 (3:17) Crazy Galpals Music Stackhouse Panda Dog Shirt
    Chris assures his fans that he has not committed suicide, and then Rickrolls his viewers.
  • Chris Sex Videos 25 September 2008 (1:49) Crazy Sex Galpals Panda Green White Stripe Leaked
    Chris records himself on webcam mass debating and performing terrifying animal impersonations for future sweetheart PandaHalo.

October 2008

  • We're Being Watched 8 October 2008 (:17) Crazy Rumors Blanca Green with Black Trim
    Chris attempts to mimic Æon Flux.
  • Captain's Log, Stardate October 9th, 2008 (3:33) Blanca Orange
    Chris issues a statement regarding the revelation that the Blanca trolls have gotten his Sonichu medallion.
  • Captain's Log, Stardate Columbus Day, 2008 (6:25) Video games Hill Dog Shirt
    Chris instructs fans to look out for Sonichu characters in LittleBigPlanet and reiterates that the Jimmy Hill merchandise is not official.
  • Christian Weston Chandler Interview 17 October 2008(4:05) Reason Politics Trolls Homos Blanca Green White Stripe
    Chris grants his first ever online interview.
  • Captain's Log, Stardate October 21st, 2008 (3:27) Tragedy Blanca Hill Vert Red
    Chris issues a statement on Blanca breaking up with him over a photo of himself wearing his mother's underwear.
  • Chris Chan Q&A 27 October 2008 (7:37) Reason Smug Comics Politics Hill Classic Shirt
    Chris answers questions from his fanbase.
  • Sonichu & Chris Chan in Guitar Hero World Tour 27 October 2008 (4:51) Video games Music Machinima
    Chris introduces his representation of himself, and Sonichu artwork on his guitar, in Guitar Hero World Tour.

December 2008

  • Captain's Log, Stardate December 28th, 2008 (2:37) Video games Comics Clyde Vert Red
    Chris thanks his fans for helping him win a gift card in a contest, offers condolences to the family of the recently-deceased Ryan Cash, and vows to complete the long-awaited Spring Break story for Sonichu 8.


January—June 2009

January 2009

  • CWC AC: City Folk Update (5:47) Video games Miyamoto Dog Shirt
    Chris announces that a deal has been made with Nintendo of America to introduce Sonichu and Rosechu as characters in the newest Animal Crossing game, although he seems to believe that early versions of these characters have somehow escaped into the internet.
  • Captain's Log, Stardate January 8th, 2009 (1:43) Rage Reason Website Clyde Miyamoto Dark Red
    Chris issues a statement announcing the hacking of sonichu.net by Gregg Mays, demanding that the site be restored.
  • I am STRAIGHT Part 1 12 January 2009 (:08) Reason Homos Miyamoto Red Yellow Stripe
    Chris holds up a picture of Britney Spears to prove he is not a homo.
  • I am STRAIGHT Part 2 12 January 2009 (9:51) Reason Homos Miyamoto Red Yellow Stripe
    A longer follow-up on how he loves and respects women.
  • Captain's Log, Stardate January 15th, 2009 (4:19) ED Miyamoto Dark Red
    Possibly under pressure from Shigeru Miyamoto and Reggie Fils-Aimé, Chris uploads this video to deny officially as possible and forbid everyone from looking at his page on Encyclopedia Dramatica.
  • Captain's Log, Stardate January 16th, 2009 (:50) Website ED Vert Blue Grey Shirt
    Chris warns his fans that Jason Kendrick Howell has hacked his Tripod account again, so he informs them of his new Tripod account and website.
  • CWC to Mr. Miyamoto-san 17 January 2009 (2:20) Reason Video games Miyamoto Vert Blue Grey Shirt
    Chris attempts to appeal to Shigeru Miyamoto's cultural background after he hit a snag when Miyamoto jumped to the conclusion that he is talking to a troll and not the real Chris.
  • Captain's Log, Stardate January 18th, 2009 (1:37) Rage Comedy Homos Sex Classic Shirt
    Chris issues a scathing statement concerning hackers who used his email account to send messages to dozens of people saying he came out of the closet, and stomps on the vibrator he has owned for years.
  • Chris's Plea to Clyde Cash 19 January 2009 (3:23) Reason Clyde Classic Shirt
    Chris begs Clyde Cash to stop torturing him for revenge over his brother's suicide, suggests Clyde just get over it, and compares the death of Ryan Cash to the death of his dog.
  • Captain's Log, Stardate January 21st, 2009 (1:35) Website The Joker
    Chris announces that sonichu.info, the site he created just days ago following the hacking of sonichu.net, has also been hacked, and promises his fans (especially the female ones) that he will restore his true website soon.
  • CWC Update 26 January 2009 (1:43) Miyamoto Jamaican Flag
    After weeks of talking about collaborating with Shigeru Miyamoto and disappearing from the internet for several days around the time that he was scheduled to meet with Miyamoto in Redmond, Washington, speculation grew that Chris was actually attempting to make this cross-country journey, until he finally posted this video, claiming to have just returned, but somehow you can just tell he hasn't even left his house since his last video.
  • Captain's Log, Stardate January 30th, 2009 (3:24) Rage Homos Miyamoto Tan Wide Lines
    Chris retracts his January 26 statement and angrily responds to Reggie Fils-Aimé and his complaint about a panty shot in Chris's PowerPoint presentation, a complaint Chris distorts into false allegations of nudity and characterizes as a general opposition to heterosexuality.
  • Captain's Log, Stardate January 31st, 2009 (5:56) Miyamoto Yellow & Red Stripe
    Chris retracts his 30 January retraction of his 26 January retraction, and apologizes for his unprofessional behavior toward Shigeru Miyamoto and Reggie Fils-Aimé, pleading them to merely postpone the Sonichu video game project indefinitely rather than cancel it outright.

February 2009

  • Chris Comes Out of the Closet 5 February 2009 (6:09) Homos Julie Clyde Dark Red
    Chris comes out of the closet and finally declares himself to be a "gaybian", in the result of Clyde threatening Julie with harm and demanding that Chris became gay on YouTube in exchange for her safety.
  • Chris Destroys His Vibrator 6 February 2009 (2:58) Homos Sex Julie Clyde Straight White Lines
    Chris explains why he had to make the two videos suggesting that he was gay, in order to satisfy an agreement with Clyde Cash, before flashing back to him ~~pulling apart~~ breaking his vibrator.
  • Captain's Log, Stardate February 8th, 2009 (2:52) Tragedy Homos Panda Julie Green Stripe
    Chris briefly recaps his previous videos, announces a new website, speculates that PandaHalo may have been killed in the Australian bushfires, and farts.
  • Captain's Log, Stardate February 10th, 2009 (3:20) Reason Video games Miyamoto Julie Dog Shirt
    Chris shows off his bedroom floor, in a bid to demonstrate to Clyde Cash that he has fulfilled his end of their agreement, and reads a letter from Nintendo of America, responding to his private query about his negotiations with Shigeru Miyamoto.
  • CWC Shout Out to Sarah May (1:56) Tragedy Galpals
    Chris apologizes to Sarah May hoping she is still alive.
  • Captain's Log, Stardate February 18th, 2009 (2:30) Homos Jamaican Flag
    Chris apologizes for his homophobia, and announces that he is finished filming a dedication for one of his sweetest Sonichu Girls--the name of which he never announces, but it's nevertheless clear that he's referring to Sarah May.
  • For Julie's Eyes Only 20 February 2009 (7:40) Crazy Sex Julie Leaked
    Chris has hanky-panky with Kimmi and yells "JULAYYYY!"
  • Ode to Julie 23 February 2009 (10:21) Galpals Julie Red Blue
    Chris gets all poetic for Julie.

March 2009

  • Captain's Log, Stardate March 4th, 2009 (2:26) Tragedy Rage Julie Vert Blue Grey Shirt
    Chris, visibly distraught after the outing of Julie, explains that he has been under a lot of stress lately, and tells his fans to not believe the trolls, even though he's not wearing his medallion.
  • Captain's Log, Stardate March 10th, 2009 (4:45) Homos Red Yellow Stripe
    Chris states his viewing of the Family Guy episode "Family Gay", is hard at work on a new Sonichu medallion, and publicly announces that he is withdrawing from the internet as a front in his Love Quest.
  • CWC Callout for Miss Emily and Stephanie (0:27) Galpals Emily The Joker
    Chris asks Emily and Stephanie to call him.
  • Apology to Emily (1:33) Galpals Emily Red Stuttgart
    Chris apologizes to Emily for missing their date.
  • Apology to Game & Hobby Place 16 March 2009 (:47) Tragedy Video games Red Stuttgart Game_Place_saga
    Chris apologizes to Michael Snyder of The GAMe PLACe so that he can buy Eye of Judgement cards.
  • Captain's Log, Stardate March 18th, 2009 (2:03) Comics Ivy Captain Falcon
    Chris explains a few recent happenings, or lack thereof, and makes a brief shout-out to Ivy.
  • Date with Emily (1:18) Comedy Emily Classic Shirt Safety Parka Leaked
    Clip from Chris's date with Emily recorded by Camwhore.
  • CWC's Message for Ivy 20 March 2009 (:59) Crazy Ivy
    Chris sends a disturbing message to Ivy.
  • CWC Music Video Holding Out For a Hero 26 March 2009 (5:52) Crazy Music Galpals Ivy Jerkop PokéShirt
    Chris makes an entire "music video" for Ivy, set to "Holding Out for a Hero" by Bonnie Tyler, and shows off new comic pictures.
  • Captain's Log, Stardate March 26th, 2009 (2:50) Comics Megan Vert Blue Grey Shirt
    Chris threatens to withhold comics from his fans if trolls refuse to leave Megan alone.
  • Tour of Chris's House 27 March 2009 (8:59) Tragedy Reason Julie Ivy Vert Blue Grey Shirt Jerkop
    Chris gives a video tour of the landfill that is his house.
  • Captain's Log, Stardate March 27th, 2009 (2:48) Rage Violence Clyde Vert Blue Grey Shirt
    Outraged over the leaking of secret information that he undoubtedly freely distributed to some stranger on the internet, Chris blows his stack and threatens to STRANGLE THAT CLYDE CASH!
  • Chris Sings Lovin' You 29 March 2009 (1:45) Crazy Music Ivy Red Blue
    In what is perhaps Chris's creepiest video to date, Chris delivers a short speech to Ivy and shows a few pictures, while his crappy cover of "Lovin' You" plays.
  • Chris Sings Fart Song for Flora 30 March 2009 (5:33) Crazy Reason Music Ivy Danger Stripe
    Chris gives a prepared speech about the importance of flatulence, and then sings about farting.
  • Take that Page DOWN NOW! 30 March 2009 (5:23) Rage Comedy Reason Crazy Violence Clyde ED Brown with Logo
    Chris rages against his ED page, and then abuses a doll with a picture of Clyde Cash attached to its face.
  • Secret Weapon 30 March 2009 (:41) Smug Clyde Brown with Logo
    Chris makes fun of Clyde Cash based on a picture of Lee Hotti that he calls his "mugshot".
  • YouTube Finale 30 March 2009 (1:08) Rage Clyde Brown with Logo
    Chris calls out to Clyde Cash again, threatening to beat him up. At the same time, he decides to withdraw from the YouTube scene...for now.

April 2009

  • Captain's Log, Stardate April 9th, 2009 (1:16) Website Vert Red
    Chris makes an announcement about a new website he made, only 10 days after leaving the internet forever.
  • Captain's Log, Stardate Easter Sunday, 2009 (1:24) Website Ivy Red Stripe
    Chris announces the recent changes to cwcville.com, and lets his sweetheart Ivy know that he loves her.
  • More for the crabs 12 April 2009 (0:28) Ivy Red Stripe
    Chris gives a shoutout to Ivy's hermit crabs, Crass and Champ.
  • The Return of Kimmi 12 April 2009 (0:50) Crazy Ivy Red Stripe
    Chris gives a shoutout to Ivy by kissing his blow-up doll taped with Ivy's face for a good 20 seconds.
  • Bunny Hop 12 April 2009 (1:01) Crazy Comedy Ivy Red Stripe
    Chris dances like a child to entertain hermit crabs.
  • A CWC Audition 16 April 2009 (7:46) Comedy Crazy Rage Sex Galpals Trolls Vanessa Ivy Straight White Lines Leaked
    Chris videotapes himself in an audition with "Vanessa Hudgens".
  • April 16 Fetish Vids 16 April 2009 (2:25) Crazy Sex Vanessa Ivy Creepy Robe Leaked
    In three leaked videos, Chris drinks his own semen, spanks himself, and dances naked in the shower.
  • I am devoted to My Sweetest Ivy 17 April 2009 (1:58) Crazy Ivy Vert Red
    Chris apologizes to Ivy by talking to his sex doll (with Ivy's face attached) before he makes out with it.
  • Matthew 5:27, CWC Confessions 17 April 2009 (4:49) Tragedy Ivy Vert Red
    Chris apologizes to Ivy for cheating on her with Vanessa Hudgens with complete insincerity.
  • Chris Calls Clyde Out 23 April 2009 (1:45) Comedy Rage Smug Crazy Clyde Red Green Stripe
    After a nearly week-long silence, Chris finally speaks up again, this time calling out Clyde Cash.
  • CWC's "It's All Coming Back To Me" 24 April 2009 (7:14) Music Galpals Ivy Classic Shirt
    Chris does another music video, this time to "It's All Coming Back to Me Now" by Celine Dion, for his and Ivy's wedding.
  • MEOW 24 April 2009 (0:04) Comedy
    Chris records his cat drawing from CWC's "It's All Coming Back To Me" and meows.
  • I Got A Fish 27 April 2009 (:12) Crazy Comedy Music Classic Shirt
    Chris jogs in place while singing a song about him brandishing fish.
  • Power 27 April 2009 (1:06) Comedy Vanessa Power Leaked
    Chris shows how "strong" he is.
  • CWCFlyingElephants 27 April 2009 (6:54) Comedy Crazy Vanessa Creepy Robe Leaked
    In what is possibly the most insane video he's ever made, Chris runs around in his room, naked, screaming whatever comes to his mind.
  • Captain's Log, Stardate April 28th, 2009 (6:04) Reason Ivy Straight White Lines
    In this set of videos, Chris addresses the 16 April release of video and pictures and admits what was already obvious--that the woman for whom he made the sex videos is Ivy.
  • Captain's Log, Stardate April 29th, 2009 (0:48) Comics Straight White Lines
    Chris apologizes for delays in any new comics and then leaves for a haircut.
  • ShutUpBrain and WakeUpBrain 30 April 2009 (1:27) Crazy Red Yellow Stripe
    Chris dramatizes his biological clock, which involves yelling at and repeatedly hitting himself.

May 2009

  • For My Sweetest Ivy 1 May 2009 (5:08) Crazy Sex Music Ivy Red Stuttgart
    Chris threatens Ivy with promises of sex and hanging out at the mall and sings a Mary Poppins song.
  • CWC Address to Unilever About AXE 1 May 2009 (6:36) Reason Homos Creepy Robe
    Chris tells Unilever to stop selling their products to homos.
  • Keep CWC's Wikipedia Up 3 May 2009 (3:03) Rage Website Red Blue
    Chris urges the Sonichu and Rosechu fanbase to keep up his Wikipedia page after it was deleted by Wikipedia Admins so that no more vicious lies and slander will spread about him on the internet.
  • CWC only accepts IN-PERSON FEMALE Encounters 20 May 2009 (1:33) Comedy Rage Reason Straight White Lines
    A little bit of everything, Chris swears off falling for trolls, sings a silly song about being lonely, and tells the trolls to die.
  • Captain's Log, Stardate May 22nd, 2009 (2:50) Website Vert Red
    Chris explains that he has closed the cwcville.com domain and has no plans to reopen it in the near future. He also notes he won't be making as many videos in the future. He seems surprisingly cognizant of the fact that if he stops producing content on the internet then the trolls will have no new material to use against him.

June 2009

  • Chris's Big Night Out 12 June 2009 (4:33)Emily Red Stuttgart
    Chris visits a local bar/restaurant, where he encounters a pair of fans who record him.
  • Don't Trust Any Homos Over There 15 June 2009 (2:02) Crazy Comedy Homos Racism Sex Music Julie Audio
    Chris sings his own version of the song "Don't Trust Them New Niggas Over There", replacing "Niggas" with "Homos."
  • I'm Sorry, Dude 15 June 2009 (3:02) Reason Homos Galpals Emily Creepy Robe
    Chris apologizes to his gal-pal Kim for offending her gay brother.


July—December 2009

July 2009

  • Captain's Log, Stardate July 1st, 2009 (2:20) Rumors Red & White
    Chris denies that he was responsible for the untimely death of CWCville Mayor BILLY MAYS. He also mentions that he's continuing his Love Quest and that he will finish the long-awaited Sonichu Comic.
  • For G4s Web Soup (1:33) Reason Television Red & White
    Chris is honored for being on Web Soup.
  • Captain's Log, Stardate July 7th, 2009 (1:09) Rumors Television Green White Stripe
    Chris dispels myths that he has a Death Note and killed BILLY MAYS.
  • The July 10th Messages 10 July 2009 (3:50) Rage Crazy The Referee
    Chris "calls out" three people by insulting them and spitting out death threats, and gets his YouTube account suspended.
  • A near public apology 11 July 2009 (1:50) Reason Red & White
    Chris NEARLY apologizes for the last videos.
  • Chris's Big Night Out II 12 July 2009 (8:21) Rage Crazy Music Sex Galpals Other Emily The Referee Live
    Chris goes to various places with Kim Wilson, gets drunk, and does karaoke.
  • Rollin' and Trollin' 17 July 2009 (7:57) Smug Comedy Music Trolls Politics Trollin' Style Live
